Subject: Client upgrade for Linux machines
Description:
Hello Team,

I want to upgrade all the windows and Linux (Ubuntu) machines at once. Can I do this as a batch job ?

And also can you give me the Linux client setup for Ubuntu 12,20,21,22,23 & 24 ?

Thanks
What_We_Know__c: Client is asking for different Ubuntu packages and if it's possible to deploy them in bulk at once as well as for Windows.

Waiting for their reply.
